content.rendered:
ASA 2016 National Staffing Employee Week

We are excited to announce that next week is ASA National Staffing Employee Week!  To celebrate such a stupendous occasion, Bridge Career will be hosting an event at our office to show our appreciation to past and current employee’s for their dedication and hard work as a staffing employee professional. We’ll have  some yummy treats, a thank you gift and other fun surprises.   Keep your eyes peeled for more details!
